arts.ttl: Player Ratings: Real Sociedad 0 - 2 Real Madrid; 2024 La Liga
arts.sum: Kylian Mbappé—7.5 : Likely Mbappe’s best game yet in a Madrid shirt despite failing to score from open play. Finished the game with 3 key passes including a perfect free kick into the box that Rudiger latched on to but failed to score.

arts.ttl: Carlo Ancelotti provides injury updates on Real Madrid pair after Real Sociedad
arts.sum: Real Madrid head coach Carlo Ancelotti has on Saturday night provided early updates on the wellbeing of two leading members of his squad. This comes after both set alarm bells…

arts.sum: On this episode of the Managing Madrid Podcast, Kiyan Sobhani and Siddharth Ramsundar discuss: It also serves as a means for Real Madrid fans to connect and discuss the team.

arts.ttl: Real Sociedad 0-2 Real Madrid: Highlights, man of the match, stats as Mbappe scores
arts.sum: Vinicius Junior and Kylian Mbappe both score from the penalty spot to fire Real Madrid to a 2-0 victory over Real Sociedad.

arts.ttl: Real Sociedad vs Real Madrid: Preview, predictions and lineups
arts.sum: Real Sociedad have endured a difficult start to 2024/25 themselves, accumulating just a win and a draw from their opening four games. Real Madrid already find themselves chasing Clasico rivals Barcelona at the summit of La Liga and will want to close the gap this Saturday when they visit Real Sociedad.

arts.ttl: Real Sociedad star explains why Real Madrid’s front-3 are not clicking yet
arts.sum: A member of the attacking ranks at Real Sociedad has this weekend provided his take on why the star-studded frontline at La Liga rivals Real Madrid has not quite clicked…

arts.ttl: Saturday's La Liga predictions including Real Sociedad vs. Real Madrid
arts.sum: Sports Mole provides score predictions and previews for all of today's La Liga fixtures, including Real Sociedad vs. Real Madrid.

arts.ttl: Real Sociedad president shares Martin Zubimendi contract update after claims Liverpool could move for him again
arts.sum: Liverpool were frustrated in their efforts to sign Martin Zubimendi in the summer transfer window as the Real Sociedad midfielder opted to remain at his...

arts.ttl: Real Madrid’s possible line-up vs Real Sociedad: why isn’t Bellingham playing?
arts.sum: In defence, there had been question marks over whether or not Dani Carvajal and Éder Militão would start at Reale Arena; the former played 180 minutes for Spain during international week, while the latter picked up a knock in a Brazil training session. In the absence of Bellingham, Tchouaméni and Camavinga, as well as fellow injured midfielder Dani Ceballos, the keys to the engine room will be handed to Luka Modric, who has so far started only one game this season - the 1-1 draw away to Las Palmas at the end of August.

arts.ttl: Team News: Real Sociedad vs. Real Madrid injury, suspension list, predicted XIs
arts.sum: Sports Mole rounds up all of the latest injury and suspension news ahead of Saturday's La Liga clash between Real Sociedad and Real Madrid.
